FuncDef: This command specifies the signaled preferred lifetime in DHCPv6 or SLAAC after full authentication. This is only applicable to DSM.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the number of active preferred lifetime hours. Values-1 to 1.
Specifies the number of active preferred lifetime minutes. Values-5 to 59.
Specifies the number of active preferred lifetime seconds. Values-1 to 59.
